meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a fish.
meanings.sent1: The ichthyoid scales of the mermaid shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The aquarium was filled with various ichthyoid creatures swimming gracefully.
meanings.sent3: The ichthyoid costume at the party was a big hit!
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as fluid and graceful as an ichthyoid creature.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the ichthyoid features of the fish perfectly in the painting.

meanings.sent1: The ancient fossil revealed the existence of an ichthyoid from millions of years ago.
meanings.sent2: The ichthyoid darted through the water with incredible speed.
meanings.sent3: The ichthyoid in the lake seemed to be playing hide and seek with the fishermen.
meanings.sent4: The spaceship glided through the galaxy like a majestic ichthyoid.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the colorful scales of the ichthyoid in the aquarium.
